events.message: The applicant submitted the personal loan application to cover upcoming medical expenses and has provided preliminary financial details.
The loan application was reviewed and categorised under 'Personal Loan' based on purpose keywords such as 'medical' and 'personal'.
A loan officer was assigned to handle the application and to guide the applicant through the process moving forward.
The initial review of the application was completed, identifying some missing documents required to proceed further.
Documents such as recent payslips, medical bills, and identification were requested from the applicant to verify the personal loan request.
The applicant submitted all requested documents promptly, including proof of income and detailed medical invoices.
A credit check was performed with standard procedures revealing a satisfactory credit score for a personal loan approval.
The risk assessment indicated a low-risk profile given the applicant's stable income and recent credit history.
The loan officer presented a favorable loan offer with competitive interest rates tailored to the applicant’s personal financial needs.
The applicant acknowledged the offer positively and requested minor adjustments to the payment schedule for better affordability.
The application was escalated to the senior loan committee following the applicant’s feedback to consider schedule adjustments.
After committee review, the loan was approved incorporating the requested payment schedule aligned with the applicant’s capacity.
The approved personal loan amount was successfully disbursed to the applicant’s bank account as per the agreed terms.
The loan officer contacted the applicant to confirm receipt of funds and provide assistance for managing scheduled repayments.
The loan application was officially closed after all disbursement and follow-up procedures were completed satisfactorily.
